15 #define FILDES_STDIO_FLAG 0x0200

18 int unistd_new_open_file(int start);
19 void * unistd_device_open(const char * name, int flags);

21 int unistd_device_read(open_file_t * open_file, void * buf, int nbyte);

24 int unistd_init_stdio(int fildes);

29 typedef struct {
30  int err;
31  const sysfs_t * fs;
32  void * handle;
33  int request;
34  void * ctl;
35 } unistd_priv_attr_t;
36 void unistd_priv_ioctl(void * args) HWPL_PRIV_EXEC_CODE;

38 
39 static inline void * get_handle(int fildes) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
40 void * get_handle(int fildes){
41  return _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].handle;
42 }
43 
44 static inline void ** get_handle_ptr(int fildes) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
45 void ** get_handle_ptr(int fildes){
46  return &(_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].handle);
47 }
48 
49 static inline const sysfs_t * get_fs(int fildes) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
50 const sysfs_t * get_fs(int fildes){
51  return (const sysfs_t*)_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].fs;
52 }
53 
54 static inline int get_flags(int fildes) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
55 int get_flags(int fildes){
56  return _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].flags;
57 }
58 
59 static inline int get_loc(int fildes) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
60 int get_loc(int fildes){
61  return _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].loc;
62 }
63 
64 static inline void * get_open_file(int fildes) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
65 void * get_open_file(int fildes){
66  return (open_file_t*)&(_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes]);
67 }
68 
69 static inline void set_loc(int fildes, int loc) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
70 void set_loc(int fildes, int loc){
71  _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].loc = loc;
72 }
73 
74 static inline void set_handle(int fildes, void * handle) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
75 void set_handle(int fildes, void * handle){
76  _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].handle = handle;
77 }
78 
79 static inline void set_fs(int fildes, const sysfs_t * fs) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
80 void set_fs(int fildes, const sysfs_t * fs){
81  _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].fs = (void*)fs;
82 }
83 
84 static inline void set_flags(int fildes, int flags) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
85 void set_flags(int fildes, int flags){
86  _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].flags = flags;
87 }
88 
89 static inline void dup_open_file(int new_fd, int old_fd) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
90 void dup_open_file(int new_fd, int old_fd){
91  memcpy( &(_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[new_fd]),
92  &(_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[old_fd]),
93  sizeof(open_file_t));
94 }
95 
96 static inline void update_loc(int fildes, int loc) HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE;
97 void update_loc(int fildes, int loc){
98  set_loc(fildes, loc);
99 }
